TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(object sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type OpenWriteCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 대리자를 만들 때, 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 식별합니다.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기와 연결하려면 대리자의 인스턴스를 해당 이벤트에 추가합니다.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 대리자를 제거하지 않는 경우 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제 데이터 업로드를 쓸 스트림을 여는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] 다음 메서드는 스트림을 사용할 수 있는 경우 호출 됩니다.The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
